modName: Female Nord Save Game (inspired by Ygritte)
descriptionHtml:
(sorry for bad english, i am norwegian)

First of all this is my first mod.Â 
I would appreciate response/comments on what i have done good and bad and what i can do better :)

----------------
Description
----------------
This is my save game which is inspired by Ygritte from Game Of Thrones. I was also inspired by MoFoPSN after i saw his Ygritte follower mod.
Extra note: I reinstalled Skyrim so that the saved game could be as clean as possible:)

-------------------
Requirements
-------------------
-SKSE : for the other mods

-Alternate Start - Live Another Life : you spawn in the dungeon and choose your own start :: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?

-ApachiiSkyHair :: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

-Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- : i used CBBE, but i guess other body mods works just fine :: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?

-Ygritte - A Standalone Follower : for some reason i could`nt find the hair style any where else ::
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55493/?

-Women of Skyrim-Enhanced female normalmaps :: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20483/?tab=3&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D20483

-The Eyes Of Beauty :: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?

-No More Blocky Faces : I don`t know if it makes a big difference :: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30/?

-SkyUI : (i don`t think it is required, but why not just installing it) :: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?

-RaceMenu : (it`s just an amazing tool) :: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?

-Freckle Mania :: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

That should be it. (that is all mods that i had installed when i created Ygritte)

--------------
Permission
---------------
Do what ever you want with her, are you not satisfied with her look then you are welcome to make changes. You can also upload your new version, just let me know :)

----------

----------
-Caliente for the CBBE body

-apachii for ApachiiSkyHair
-expired6978 for RaceMenu

-Arthmoor for Alternate Start

---------------
Change log
---------------
Version 1.5:
changed a little on her eyebrows, mouth and nose

I am not that good at taking screenshots. I would appreciate if someone could be generous and take some nice screenshots for me :)
author: Zmugzoo
